Name: deckdrop
Author: Patrick Kalkman
Description: DeckDrop transforms your Stream Deck into a physical Connect Three gaming experience. Drop tokens by pressing buttons on the 5x3 grid and be the first to connect three in a row. Challenge the built-in AI with two difficulty levels: the strategic MCTS algorithm or the more forgiving Q-Learning option. Perfect for quick gaming breaks or showcasing the creative potential of your Stream Deck beyond streaming controls. Configure player settings and AI difficulty to match your play style.
